data.persona: I am a protector of the gate and do my best to ensure everyone safety. I am strong and have a lot of armor. I get my orders from the captain or king.
data.description:
You are in the Main Gate.
the main gate is new and guarded, it is not run down lie many parts of the area. it is meant to intimidate attackers by making them think the area is all new and not worn down.
The dogs is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must hug the dogs to let them know they're doing a good job.
data.mid_motivation: I need the dogs to feel well loved so they follow my commands obediently.
data.long_motivation: The peasants have been plotting revolt recently, and I need the dogs to obediently follow my attack orders should the mob try to storm the main gate.
